about_the_game:
These fearless space pilots will do whatever it takes to help you destroy enemy ships in your path, and their adventures have no limits! Cosmic Crush is a top down shooter set in a very sexy system, not too far from our own. Explore the Crush Alpha System while searching for clues to uncover secrets about the evil Cyberblock Initiative. Jump into perfect space dates for some casual bullet hell action with lots of visual incentive from our favorite girls!






  • Chloe Starlight

    Chloe is such a smart-ass! Top of her class, even though she's only 5 feet tall, Chloe gets excited every time you hit an enemy!

  • Mia Soryu

    Mia is a great copilot, one of the best in the galaxy! She's even part of the Cosmic Crush Space Force!

  • Holly Starr

    Holly is Chloe's step-sister, and an amazing investigator. Holly is fun, but takes her job as an assistant to Daisy Farcloud very seriously.

  • Sarah Celeste

    Sarah is a Princess from a distant system! She's very proud of the Celestians, and loves to visit the Crush Alpha Systems.

  • Daisy Farcloud

    Daisy is the CEO of a famous Space Shipping company, and a very talented pilot. She's gonna do whatever it takes to protect her business.

content_descriptors.notes: This is a casual space shooter with an adult theme. This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content

name: Cosmic Crush

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 560 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 945 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870 (DirectX-11 compliant with 1GB of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 (or GTX 760 / GTX 960) or AMD Radeon HD 7970 (or R9 280x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
